main event: An observer at Ernest Harmon AFB reported feeling a hand turn while noticing a silhouette behind him, but upon investigation, nothing was found.
interesting points: The sighting occurred at 0220 hours on September 2, 1950., The observer was located on the east end of the runway., There were no photographs included in the report., The report concludes there is insufficient data for evaluation., Previous observations from flight crews included a large lozenge-shaped object and smaller circular objects.
